title.narrative: Diversification and technological innovation and value-added business development smallholding farmers of Santa Maria. N/A. Diversification and technological innovation with value-added, and business development of smallholding farmers of Santa Maria

description.narrative: Cooperativa Agroganadera Diaguita Limitada de Santa María (Diaguita) will work with cooperative and community members in and around Santa Maria to improve and diversify their agricultural production, develop and market value-added agricultural and commercial products, and strengthen the ability of the cooperative to offer value added services for agricultural products as well as act a as a resource for local economic development in the region. Approximately 230 individuals will benefit directly and 2,000 people will benefit indirectly.. Cooperativa Agroganadera Diaguita Limitada de Santa María (Diaguita) IAF Grant: US$164,500. Over three years Diaguita will work with cooperative and community members in and around Santa Maria to improve and diversify their agricultural production, develop and market value- added agricultural and commercial products, and strengthen the ability of the cooperative to offer value added services for agricultural products as well as act a as a resource for local economic development in the region. Approximately 230 individuals will benefit directly and 2,000 people will benefit indirectly.. Cooperativa Agroganadera Diaguita Limitada de Santa María (Diaguita). Over three years Diaguita will work with cooperative and community members in and around Santa Maria to improve and diversify their agricultural production, develop and market value-added agricultural and commercial products, and strengthen the ability of the cooperative to offer value added services for agricultural products as well as act a as a resource for local economic development in the region. Approximately 230 individuals will benefit directly and 2,000 people will benefit indirectly.. description.narrative: U.S. assistance in Argentina promotes regional stability and nonproliferation, and enhances opportunities for mutually beneficial economic initiatives. The Argentine government's approaches towards international peacekeeping operations (PKO), the nonproliferation of weapons of mass destruction, and counterterrorism are welcome developments. Although the previous Kirchner government placed substantial constraints on security, counternarcotics, and law enforcement cooperation in recent years, the new government, which took office on December 10, has signaled very clearly that it seeks much more robust cooperation with the United States on all of these issues.
Disbursement of funds to the Award Implementing Organization to carry out the activities set forth in Annex A of the grant agreement.
